cards.flavor: The virtues of knighthood are best taught in the field.
cards.name: Attended Knight
cards.text:
First strike
When Attended Knight enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

cards.name: Banishing Stroke
cards.text:
Put target artifact, creature, or enchantment on the bottom of its owner's library.
Miracle {W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

cards.flavor: "Flesh is a betrayal of the self."
cards.name: Blade Splicer
cards.text:
When Blade Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
Golem creatures you control have first strike.

cards.name: Entreat the Angels
cards.text:
Create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying.
Miracle {X}{W}{W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

cards.flavor:
"What root and branch cannot reach, our winged friends will attend to."
—Zunak, Selesnya strategist
cards.name: Eyes in the Skies
cards.text: Create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

cards.flavor: Its wings disturb more than air.
cards.name: Flickerwisp
cards.text:
Flying
When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor: "The essence of a lawful society is swift deterrence."
cards.name: Gideon's Lawkeeper
cards.text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

cards.flavor: "In my moment of death, I had a vision of the world, dark and unwelcoming. I wanted to hide in the deepest meander, but the light pulled me back."
cards.name: Graceful Reprieve
cards.text: When target creature dies this turn, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

cards.flavor: In life, they were a motley crew: farmers, lords, cutpurses, priests. In death, they are united in singular, benevolent purpose.
cards.name: Intangible Virtue
cards.text: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

cards.flavor: "For us, a rope represents the ties that bind the kor. For you, it's more literal."
cards.name: Kor Hookmaster
cards.text: When Kor Hookmaster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

cards.flavor: "Sometimes I snare the unexpected, but I know its purpose will be revealed in time."
cards.name: Kor Skyfisher
cards.text:
Flying
When Kor Skyfisher enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor: The murdered inhabitants of Hollowhenge impart to the living the terror they felt in death.
cards.name: Lingering Souls
cards.text:
Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
Flashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.flavor: Those who seek to disturb the harmony of life will see their instruments taken from them.
cards.name: Linvala, Keeper of Silence
cards.text:
Flying
Activated abilities of creatures your opponents control can't be activated.

cards.flavor: His mission has become a grim pilgrimage, a tour of the Eldrazi-stricken outposts across Zendikar. But he marches on alone, stubborn as the daily dawn.
cards.name: Lone Missionary
cards.text: When Lone Missionary enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

cards.flavor: With Phyrexia's victory at hand, each sect began perfecting its vision.
cards.name: Master Splicer
cards.text:
When Master Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
Golem creatures you control get +1/+1.

cards.name: Momentary Blink
cards.text:
Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Flashback {3}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Path to Exile
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search his or her library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle his or her library.

cards.flavor: Each spike is poisoned—the trapmaker's idea of mercy.
cards.name: Pitfall Trap
cards.text:
If exactly one creature is attacking, you may pay {W} rather than pay Pitfall Trap's mana cost.
Destroy target attacking creature without flying.

cards.flavor: At his side, humble beasts become weapons more deadly than sharpened steel.
cards.name: Ranger of Eos
cards.text: When Ranger of Eos enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to two creature cards with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

cards.name: Restoration Angel
cards.text:
Flash
Flying
When Restoration Angel enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Angel creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Rootborn Defenses
cards.text: Populate. Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. (To populate, create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

cards.name: Séance
cards.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, you may exile target creature card from your graveyard. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a Spirit in addition to its other types. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor: With clarity of vision comes clarity of function.
cards.name: Sensor Splicer
cards.text:
When Sensor Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
Golem creatures you control have vigilance.

cards.flavor: "One does not question the size or shape of the grains of sand in an hourglass. Nor do I question the temperament of the souls under my guidance."
cards.name: Soul Warden
cards.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: The relic's purpose? Its design? Whatever the intent, it is now a mere curiosity that breaks up the horizon.
cards.name: Stony Silence
cards.text: Activated abilities of artifacts can't be activated.

cards.name: Terminus
cards.text:
Put all creatures on the bottom of their owners' libraries.
Miracle {W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

cards.flavor:
"Guilds be damned. We can fend for ourselves."
—Vennick of the Gateless
cards.name: Urbis Protector
cards.text: When Urbis Protector enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

cards.flavor:
"You see a bird, an oak, a packbeast. I see the potential for an army."
—Lalia, Selesnya dryad
cards.name: Wake the Reflections
cards.text: Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

cards.flavor:
"Let no child be without a sword. We will all fight, for if we fail, we will certainly all die."
—Oracle en-Vec
cards.name: Youthful Knight
cards.text: First strike

cards.name: Augur of Bolas
cards.text: When Augur of Bolas enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.flavor:
"We draw our power from the infinite ocean of the mind, where all manner of things can be conceived."
—Azure creed
cards.name: Azure Mage
cards.text: {3}{U}: Draw a card.

cards.name: Cackling Counterpart
cards.text:
Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.
Flashback {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.flavor: "Four parts molten bronze, yes . . . one part frozen mercury, yes, yes . . . but then what?"
cards.name: Compulsive Research
cards.text: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless he or she discards a land card.

cards.flavor: One breath of the geist turns veins to rivers of ice and freezes hearts midbeat.
cards.name: Crippling Chill
cards.text:
Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor: The Izzet specialize in unnatural disaster.
cards.name: Cyclonic Rift
cards.text:
Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
Overload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

cards.name: Deadeye Navigator
cards.text:
Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
As long as Deadeye Navigator is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "{1}{U}: Exile this creature, then return it to the battlefield under your control."

cards.flavor: Because of their capricious nature, faeries can serve as living lenses for disruptive magic.
cards.name: Familiar's Ruse
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Familiar's Ruse, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.
Counter target spell.

cards.name: Forbidden Alchemy
cards.text:
Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.flavor: Sometimes it's useful to take a break from existence.
cards.name: Ghostly Flicker
cards.text: Exile two target artifacts, creatures, and/or lands you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Gifts Ungiven
cards.text: Search your library for up to four cards with different names and reveal them. Target opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Grasp of Phantoms
cards.text:
Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
Flashback {7}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.flavor: A spike and a maul are needed to crack their shells, but the taste is worth the effort.
cards.name: Kraken Hatchling

cards.flavor:
"When you see a raven, head for the hills. It knows when the ghost-tide is headed in."
—Sved, fisherman of Nephalia
cards.name: Mist Raven
cards.text:
Flying
When Mist Raven enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Mystical Teachings
cards.text:
Search your library for an instant card or a card with flash, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
Flashback {5}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.flavor: "Opportunity isn't something you wait for. It's something you create."
cards.name: Opportunity
cards.text: Target player draws four cards.

cards.name: Phantasmal Image
cards.text: You may have Phantasmal Image enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's an Illusion in addition to its other types and it gains "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."

cards.flavor: "The best denials are simply that: a beginning and end unchanged, a dream with no memory."
cards.name: Rewind
cards.text: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.

cards.flavor: "The secret entrance should be near."
cards.name: Sea Gate Oracle
cards.text: When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

cards.flavor: Serum was once derived from Mirrodin's blinkmoths, offering visions of inspiration. Now it is pulled from Phyrexian inkmoths, yielding visions of perfection.
cards.name: Serum Visions
cards.text: Draw a card. Scry 2.

cards.name: Snapcaster Mage
cards.text:
Flash
When Snapcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.flavor:
"There's a hole in your plan."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage
cards.name: Spell Pierce
cards.text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.

cards.flavor: Each monitor is given an eye for each spire it is to guard.
cards.name: Spire Monitor
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying

cards.name: Tandem Lookout
cards.text:
Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
As long as Tandem Lookout is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, draw a card."

cards.flavor: Time is a marvelous plaything.
cards.name: Temporal Mastery
cards.text:
Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Temporal Mastery.
Miracle {1}{U} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

cards.flavor: His marvels of artifice pale in comparison to the developing machinery of his mind.
cards.name: Venser, Shaper Savant
cards.text:
Flash
When Venser, Shaper Savant enters the battlefield, return target spell or permanent to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor:
"I welcome it. The pasture is cleared of weeds and the wolves are frozen solid."
—Lumi, goatherd
cards.name: Wall of Frost
cards.text:
Defender
Whenever Wall of Frost blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

cards.flavor: "Progress is our great inheritance, perfection our ultimate destination."
cards.name: Wing Splicer
cards.text:
When Wing Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
Golem creatures you control have flying.

cards.name: Wingcrafter
cards.text:
Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
As long as Wingcrafter is paired with another creature, both creatures have flying.

cards.flavor: It rides to a chorus of whispers that are more felt than heard.
cards.name: Abyssal Specter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

cards.flavor: Witches of the Split-Eye Coven speak of a future when Grixis will overflow with life energy. For now, they must harvest vis from the living to fuel their dark magics.
cards.name: Bone Splinters
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Bone Splinters, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature.

cards.name: Corpse Connoisseur
cards.text:
When Corpse Connoisseur enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card and put that card into your graveyard. If you do, shuffle your library.
Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor:
"You will fully understand fear when you discover it is the final thing you put your faith in."
—Nicol Bolas
cards.name: Cower in Fear
cards.text: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Damnation
cards.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

cards.flavor: The shadow of the candle looms tall even as its light grows dim.
cards.name: Death's Shadow
cards.text: Death's Shadow gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.

cards.flavor: There came a rush, a sudden fire in the mind. Then the two saw only the sooty fog of madness, heard only the crackling of their last thoughts burning away.
cards.name: Delirium Skeins
cards.text: Each player discards three cards.

cards.name: Desecration Demon
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of each combat, any opponent may sacrifice a creature. If a player does, tap Desecration Demon and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.flavor: The undead of Grixis are fueled by their hatred of the living.
cards.name: Dregscape Zombie
cards.text: Unearth {B} ({B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Entomber Exarch
cards.text:
When Entomber Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature card from it. That player discards that card.

cards.name: Extractor Demon
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever another creature leaves the battlefield, you may have target player put the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Unearth {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: "I often think on how excited they must feel to be chosen as my prey."
cards.name: Falkenrath Noble
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Falkenrath Noble or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor: On still nights you can hear its rotted teeth grinding tirelessly on scavenged bones.
cards.name: Gnawing Zombie
cards.text: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor:
"Avacyn emerged from the broken Helvault, but her freedom came at a price—him."
—Thalia, Knight-Cathar
cards.name: Griselbrand
cards.text:
Flying, lifelink
Pay 7 life: Draw seven cards.

cards.name: Grisly Spectacle
cards.text: Destroy target nonartifact creature. Its controller puts a number of cards equal to that creature's power from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

cards.name: Grixis Slavedriver
cards.text:
When Grixis Slavedriver leaves the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: After the awakening of the Eldrazi, some vampires took it upon themselves to remind the others where their loyalty should lie.
cards.name: Inquisition of Kozilek
cards.text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it with converted mana cost 3 or less. That player discards that card.

cards.name: Liliana of the Veil
cards.text:
+1: Each player discards a card.
−2: Target player sacrifices a creature.
−6: Separate all permanents target player controls into two piles. That player sacrifices all permanents in the pile of his or her choice.

cards.flavor: Dark thoughts hatch and twist within the mind, straining to take wing.
cards.name: Mind Shatter
cards.text: Target player discards X cards at random.

cards.flavor: To the soldier, war is famine; to the scavenger, a feast.
cards.name: Mortician Beetle
cards.text: Whenever a player sacrifices a creature, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Mortician Beetle.

cards.flavor: Innistrad is a place where dreams invade the mind and mere shadows exact a terrible toll.
cards.name: Night Terrors
cards.text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.

cards.flavor: It took three years for it to occur to him to use the chain as a weapon, but once it did, he made up for lost time.
cards.name: Ogre Jailbreaker
cards.text:
Defender
Ogre Jailbreaker can attack as though it didn't have defender as long as you control a Gate.

cards.flavor: "The undead are not ‘awakened.' They are evicted when there is no room left in the pit for more bodies."
cards.name: Pit Keeper
cards.text: When Pit Keeper enters the battlefield, if you have four or more creature cards in your graveyard, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: "Wisdom from the past is best gathered directly from the source."
cards.name: Recover
cards.text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Draw a card.

cards.flavor:
"A basilisk's gaze is effective, but disposing of physical remains is a tiresome task. It's far more discreet to dissolve one's victim entirely."
—Szadek
cards.name: Seal of Doom
cards.text: Sacrifice Seal of Doom: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Sever the Bloodline
cards.text:
Exile target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature.
Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.flavor: All crave the Blessed Sleep. Few receive it.
cards.name: Unburial Rites
cards.text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Flashback {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.flavor: "I admit, I am a creature of the city. The sights, the nightly excitement, the abundance of fine drink . . ."
cards.name: Vampire Aristocrat
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature: Vampire Aristocrat gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: As they fought the Eldrazi, many vampires learned to live among humans. Others were unable to make the adjustment.
cards.name: Vampire Nighthawk
cards.text: Flying, deathtouch, lifelink

cards.flavor: If there's anything a werewolf hates, it's a collar—especially Avacyn's Collar, the symbol of her church.
cards.name: Ancient Grudge
cards.text:
Destroy target artifact.
Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.flavor: The shaman rattles not to inspire a battle fury but to drown out the shrieks of those fleeing the Eldrazi.
cards.name: Battle-Rattle Shaman
cards.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Heavy light flooded across the landscape, cloaking everything in deep crimson.
cards.name: Blood Moon
cards.text: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

cards.name: Bonfire of the Damned
cards.text:
Bonfire of the Damned deals X damage to target player and each creature he or she controls.
Miracle {X}{R} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

cards.flavor: Chandra never believed in using her "inside voice."
cards.name: Chandra's Outrage
cards.text: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

cards.flavor: Goblins journey to the sacrificial peaks in pairs so that the rare survivor might be able to relate the details of the other's grisly demise.
cards.name: Dragon Fodder
cards.text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

cards.flavor: Nothing evens the odds like a little lightning.
cards.name: Dynacharge
cards.text:
Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
Overload {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

cards.flavor: A goblin raid is a delicate gambit—a blend of stealth, precision, and screaming death.
cards.name: Goblin Assault
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste.
Goblin creatures attack each turn if able.

cards.flavor: "I've been all over this world. I even remember some of those places."
cards.name: Goblin Guide
cards.text:
Haste
Whenever Goblin Guide attacks, defending player reveals the top card of his or her library. If it's a land card, that player puts it into his or her hand.

cards.name: Hanweir Lancer
cards.text:
Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)
As long as Hanweir Lancer is paired with another creature, both creatures have first strike.

cards.flavor:
"Behind every devil's mayhem lurks a demon's scheme."
—Rem Karolus, Blade of the Inquisitors
cards.name: Hellrider
cards.text:
Haste
Whenever a creature you control attacks, Hellrider deals 1 damage to defending player.

cards.flavor: The larger the crowd, the harder it is for them to run away.
cards.name: Madcap Skills
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has menace.

cards.flavor: Some Akroans make the dangerous pilgrimage to the volcanic temples of Purphoros, where oracles known as flamespeakers glean omens from lava.
cards.name: Magma Jet
cards.text: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Scry 2.

cards.name: Mizzium Mortars
cards.text:
Mizzium Mortars deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control.
Overload {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

cards.flavor: They'll attack whatever's in front of them—as long as you tell them where that is.
cards.name: Mogg Flunkies
cards.text: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.

cards.flavor: It came as a cruel answer to the farmers' prayers.
cards.name: Molten Rain
cards.text: Destroy target land. If that land was nonbasic, Molten Rain deals 2 damage to the land's controller.

cards.flavor: The oil sloshes against his skull as he nears his destination: the Frogtosser Games and the lighting of the Flaming Boggart.
cards.name: Mudbutton Torchrunner
cards.text: When Mudbutton Torchrunner dies, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Past in Flames
cards.text:
Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost.
Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Pyrewild Shaman
cards.text:
Bloodrush — {1}{R}, Discard Pyrewild Shaman: Target attacking creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, if Pyrewild Shaman is in your graveyard, you may pay {3}. If you do, return Pyrewild Shaman to your hand.

cards.flavor:
"Who'd want to ignite things one at a time?"
—Chandra Nalaar
cards.name: Pyroclasm
cards.text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

cards.name: Pyromancer Ascension
cards.text:
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that has the same name as a card in your graveyard, you may put a quest counter on Pyromancer Ascension.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell while Pyromancer Ascension has two or more quest counters on it, you may copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

cards.flavor:
"The maaka remain loyal to us in this time of strife. We don't even have to feed them—our enemies do."
—Nedja, Gruul shaman
cards.name: Rubblebelt Maaka
cards.text: Bloodrush — {R}, Discard Rubblebelt Maaka: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Each small blaze she sets jogs her memory, letting her piece together the mystery of her own fiery end.
cards.name: Scorched Rusalka
cards.text: {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Scorched Rusalka deals 1 damage to target player.

cards.name: Scourge Devil
cards.text:
When Scourge Devil enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
Unearth {2}{R} ({2}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: "Within blood is life. Within life is fire. Within fire is the path to our masters' glory!"
cards.name: Skirsdag Cultist
cards.text: {R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skirsdag Cultist deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Thunderous Wrath
cards.text:
Thunderous Wrath deals 5 damage to target creature or player.
Miracle {R} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

cards.flavor: The horror lurched about like a puppet from a madman's nightmare, squeezing the life from its own kind.
cards.name: Traitorous Instinct
cards.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste.

cards.name: Vithian Stinger
cards.text:
{T}: Vithian Stinger deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Zealous Conscripts
cards.text:
Haste
When Zealous Conscripts enters the battlefield, gain control of target permanent until end of turn. Untap that permanent. It gains haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Arachnus Spinner
cards.text:
Reach
Tap an untapped Spider you control: Search your graveyard and/or library for a card named Arachnus Web and put it onto the battlefield attached to target creature. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

cards.name: Arachnus Web
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
At the beginning of the end step, if enchanted creature's power is 4 or greater, destroy Arachnus Web.

cards.flavor: "Avacyn's protection is everywhere. From the holy church to the sacred glade, all that we see is under her blessed watch."
cards.name: Avacyn's Pilgrim
cards.text: {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Baloth Cage Trap
cards.text:
If an opponent had an artifact enter the battlefield under his or her control this turn, you may pay {1}{G} rather than pay Baloth Cage Trap's mana cost.
Create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.

cards.name: Call of the Herd
cards.text:
Create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.
Flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Craterhoof Behemoth
cards.text:
Haste
When Craterhoof Behemoth enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

cards.flavor:
"Size alone does not guarantee survival."
—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger
cards.name: Death-Hood Cobra
cards.text:
{1}{G}: Death-Hood Cobra gains reach until end of turn.
{1}{G}: Death-Hood Cobra gains deathtouch until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "So many oppose us, but we are the reed that bends without breaking."
cards.name: Druid's Deliverance
cards.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn. Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

cards.flavor: An explorer's reward is a view of tomorrow's possibilities.
cards.name: Explore
cards.text:
You may play an additional land this turn.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Fists of Ironwood
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Fists of Ironwood enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
Enchanted creature has trample.

cards.flavor:
"To those who can hear it, Gaea's battle song brings power as swift as sunlight and as enduring as the deep roots of the forest."
—Gamelen, Citanul elder
cards.name: Gaea's Anthem
cards.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1.

cards.flavor:
"Life's greatest lessons don't come from focus or concentration. They come from breathing and simply noticing."
—Seton, centaur druid
cards.name: Harmonize
cards.text: Draw three cards.

cards.flavor: If a spriggan's eyes are larger than its stomach, it has ways to remedy the situation.
cards.name: Hungry Spriggan
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever Hungry Spriggan attacks, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"Krosa the great. Krosa the enduring. Look to the forest, and it will share its bounty."
—Zyd, Kamahlite druid
cards.name: Might of Old Krosa
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If you cast this spell during your main phase, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.

cards.flavor: When it snared a passing cockatrice, its own soul darkly doubled.
cards.name: Penumbra Spider
cards.text:
Reach
When Penumbra Spider dies, create a 2/4 black Spider creature token with reach.

cards.name: Primal Command
cards.text:
Choose two —
• Target player gains 7 life.
• Put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library.
• Target player shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.
• Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: Even what is lost beyond recall returns when coaxed by a dryad's hand.
cards.name: Revive
cards.text: Return target green card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor: In nature, not a single bone or scrap of flesh goes to waste.
cards.name: Scavenging Ooze
cards.text: {G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenging Ooze and you gain 1 life.

cards.flavor:
"I am the simplifier, the root that drags all artifice to earth."
—Seal inscription
cards.name: Seal of Primordium
cards.text: Sacrifice Seal of Primordium: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.flavor: The Orzhov clergy would never cross its path, but sending thrull couriers to do so is cheap and entertaining.
cards.name: Slaughterhorn
cards.text: Bloodrush — {G}, Discard Slaughterhorn: Target attacking creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"Give me enough refuse and mana and I will summon an ooze that can engulf all of Ravnica."
—Cevraya, Golgari shaman
cards.name: Slime Molding
cards.text: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token.

cards.flavor:
"The hermit dies. The outcast dies. The lone wolf dies. Only those who stick together survive this world."
—Uros, Pendelhaven elder
cards.name: Strength in Numbers
cards.text: Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +X/+X, where X is the number of attacking creatures.

cards.name: Summoning Trap
cards.text:
If a creature spell you cast this turn was countered by a spell or ability an opponent controlled, you may pay {0} rather than pay Summoning Trap's mana cost.
Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.flavor: "Not all paths are found on the forest floor."
cards.name: Sylvan Ranger
cards.text: When Sylvan Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: What doesn't grow, dies. And what dies grows the tarmogoyf.
cards.name: Tarmogoyf
cards.text: Tarmogoyf's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

cards.name: Thornscape Battlemage
cards.text:
Kicker {R} and/or {W} (You may pay an additional {R} and/or {W} as you cast this spell.)
When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {R} kicker, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {W} kicker, destroy target artifact.

cards.flavor:
"Always carry two spears."
—Mokgar, Kalonian hunter
cards.name: Thragtusk
cards.text:
When Thragtusk enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.
When Thragtusk leaves the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

cards.flavor: "Peace will come to Innistrad, but only after all abominations have been dealt with, one by one."
cards.name: Ulvenwald Tracker
cards.text: {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature you control fights another target creature.

cards.flavor:
"For every one that falls, ten shall rise. The revelation of New Phyrexia is at hand."
—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger
cards.name: Vital Splicer
cards.text:
When Vital Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
{1}: Regenerate target Golem you control.

cards.flavor: The Izzet quickly suspended their policy of lifetime guarantees.
cards.name: Abrupt Decay
cards.text:
Abrupt Decay can't be countered by spells or abilities.
Destroy target nonland permanent with converted mana cost 3 or less.

cards.flavor: The consciousness of Mat'Selesnya does not always spread in peaceful ways.
cards.name: Advent of the Wurm
cards.text: Create a 5/5 green Wurm creature token with trample.

cards.name: Aethermage's Touch
cards.text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. It gains "At the beginning of your end step, return this creature to its owner's hand." Then put the rest of the cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.flavor: "Two-faced" is an understatement.
cards.name: Agent of Masks
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

cards.flavor: Life's circle has become inverted in Grixis. The same energy is endlessly recycled and becomes more stagnant with each pass.
cards.name: Agony Warp
cards.text:
Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
Target creature gets -0/-3 until end of turn.

cards.flavor:
"Finally, a weapon the Boros can't confiscate!"
—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue
cards.name: Auger Spree
cards.text: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: They fight for their home with more loyalty than any conscript.
cards.name: Bronzebeak Moa
cards.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Bronzebeak Moa gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Frozen in fear, the goblins stared upward at the circling hunter—and were promptly eaten by its diving mate.
cards.name: Broodmate Dragon
cards.text:
Flying
When Broodmate Dragon enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

cards.flavor: Centaurs are sent to evangelize in Gruul territories where words of war speak louder than prayers of peace.
cards.name: Call of the Conclave
cards.text: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token.

cards.flavor: Not the foulest or bloodiest act at Rix Maadi by a stretch.
cards.name: Carnage Gladiator
cards.text:
Whenever a creature blocks, that creature's controller loses 1 life.
{1}{B}{R}: Regenerate Carnage Gladiator.

cards.flavor: Instructors at the Kasarna training grounds are capable healers in case their students fail to grasp the subtleties of combat.
cards.name: Centaur Healer
cards.text: When Centaur Healer enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

cards.flavor: Snaking remnants of nature directed by a body of thought and progress, the oracles embody all that is Simic.
cards.name: Coiling Oracle
cards.text: When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

cards.flavor: There is always a greater power.
cards.name: Cruel Ultimatum
cards.text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature, discards three cards, then loses 5 life. You return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand, draw three cards, then gain 5 life.

cards.flavor: "Everyone deserves a day in court."
cards.name: Deputy of Acquittals
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Deputy of Acquittals enters the battlefield, you may return another target creature you control to its owner's hand.

cards.flavor:
"Welcome to the Dimir Public Offices. Not responsible for death or loss of property. Basement off-limits."
—Sign outside Dinrova Building
cards.name: Dinrova Horror
cards.text: When Dinrova Horror enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand, then that player discards a card.

cards.name: Domri Rade
cards.text:
+1: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.
−2: Target creature you control fights another target creature.
−7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control have double strike, trample, hexproof, and haste."

cards.flavor: You can always tell the evil one by the dagger he's sticking in you.
cards.name: Evil Twin
cards.text: You may have Evil Twin enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it gains "{U}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature with the same name as this creature."

cards.flavor: "Your blood is quite pleasing. A pity there's not enough for both of us."
cards.name: Falkenrath Aristocrat
cards.text:
Flying, haste
Sacrifice a creature: Falkenrath Aristocrat gains indestructible until end of turn. If the sacrificed creature was a Human, put a +1/+1 counter on Falkenrath Aristocrat.

cards.flavor: When the rebels couldn't breach the castle to kill Lalor the Obstinate, they tried a more internal approach to depose the pretender king.
cards.name: Fiery Justice
cards.text: Fiery Justice deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players. Target opponent gains 5 life.

cards.flavor:
"The Simic come from the cold slow depths. How could they understand the fire in a wild heart?"
—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman
cards.name: Ghor-Clan Rampager
cards.text:
Trample
Bloodrush — {R}{G}, Discard Ghor-Clan Rampager: Target attacking creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.

cards.flavor: When asked how much power is required, Izzet mages always answer "more."
cards.name: Goblin Electromancer
cards.text: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

cards.flavor: The Golgari don't bury their dead. They plant them.
cards.name: Golgari Germination
cards.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

cards.flavor: Like corpse-worms through a carapace, rotwurms slide through the hollowed bones of the undercity.
cards.name: Golgari Rotwurm
cards.text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life.

cards.flavor:
"Taking down a dragon is easy. All you need is enough space to get in a good swing."
—Narbulg Nine Fingers
cards.name: Ground Assault
cards.text: Ground Assault deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.

cards.flavor:
"We are the heart of the wild, the fire in its eyes, and the howl in its throat. Come, join the battle to which you were born."
—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman
cards.name: Gruul War Chant
cards.text: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 and have menace.

cards.name: Izzet Charm
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
• Izzet Charm deals 2 damage to target creature.
• Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

cards.name: Kathari Bomber
cards.text:
Flying
When Kathari Bomber deals combat damage to a player, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens and sacrifice Kathari Bomber.
Unearth {3}{B}{R} ({3}{B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor:
"Touched by moroii"
—Undercity slang meaning "to grow old"
cards.name: Moroii
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.

cards.flavor:
"The Simic can grow anything out of a puddle of sludge. I just hope they never join forces with the Golgari."
—Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov
cards.name: Mystic Genesis
cards.text: Counter target spell. Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

cards.flavor: He has no patience for minds that do not inspire him or explode by trying.
cards.name: Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius deals damage to a player, you may draw a card.
{U}{R}: Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Obzedat, Ghost Council
cards.text:
When Obzedat, Ghost Council enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
At the beginning of your end step, you may exile Obzedat. If you do, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep. It gains haste.

cards.name: Olivia Voldaren
cards.text:
Flying
{1}{R}: Olivia Voldaren deals 1 damage to another target creature. That creature becomes a Vampire in addition to its other types. Put a +1/+1 counter on Olivia Voldaren.
{3}{B}{B}: Gain control of target Vampire for as long as you control Olivia Voldaren.

cards.flavor: Mirko Vosk hunted anyone with knowledge of the maze, draining the chances of the other guilds.
cards.name: Pilfered Plans
cards.text: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Draw two cards.

cards.flavor:
"We are all decaying, always in a state of near-death. One moment without breath and we begin to break down."
—Cevraya, Golgari shaman
cards.name: Putrefy
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.flavor: Rhox monks are dedicated to spiritual growth and learning, and most bear the sigils of many students. However, they do not gladly suffer fools or those who disagree with their carefully wrought dogma.
cards.name: Rhox War Monk
cards.text: Lifelink

cards.name: Sedraxis Specter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Sedraxis Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
Unearth {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor:
"We've bred out the shortcomings of the species' natural form and replaced them with assets of our own design."
—Momir Vig
cards.name: Simic Sky Swallower
cards.text:
Flying, trample
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

cards.flavor: "That must weigh heavily on your soul. Let me purge it for you."
cards.name: Sin Collector
cards.text: When Sin Collector enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it and exile that card.

cards.flavor:
"I do not know which gives me more pride: the legions of soldiers marching in thunderous lockstep, or the cry of the skyknights riding their rocs like jagged lightning overhead."
—Razia
cards.name: Skyknight Legionnaire
cards.text: Flying, haste

cards.flavor:
"Birth and death are both reversible."
—Nicol Bolas
cards.name: Soul Manipulation
cards.text:
Choose one or both —
• Counter target creature spell.
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Soul Ransom
cards.text:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
Discard two cards: Soul Ransom's controller sacrifices it, then draws two cards. Only any opponent may activate this ability.

cards.flavor: "Let the knowledge of absolute law inspire you to live a life of absolute order."
cards.name: Sphinx's Revelation
cards.text: You gain X life and draw X cards.

cards.flavor: For the Rakdos, "suicidal charge" and "good showmanship" are one and the same.
cards.name: Spike Jester
cards.text: Haste

cards.flavor: The vast network of predation on Jund has actually caused some strange creatures to adapt to being eaten.
cards.name: Sprouting Thrinax
cards.text: When Sprouting Thrinax dies, create three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

cards.flavor: Even the most battle-hardened soldiers pause in her presence for a moment of introspection.
cards.name: Stoic Angel
cards.text:
Flying, vigilance
Players can't untap more than one creature during their untap steps.

cards.name: Sunhome Guildmage
cards.text:
{1}{R}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
{2}{R}{W}: Create a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token with haste.

cards.flavor: "The volcanic winds make a maze of the skies of Jund. If we mean to invade, we must first learn their invisible paths."
cards.name: Talon Trooper
cards.text: Flying

cards.name: Teleportal
cards.text:
Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
Overload {3}{U}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

cards.flavor: All suns must set.
cards.name: Terminate
cards.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.flavor:
"Hear that? Those notes mean we've arrived at Sunhome! Let our allies' hearts soar and our enemies' hearts shatter at the sound!"
—Klattic, Boros legionnaire
cards.name: Thundersong Trumpeter
cards.text: {T}: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.

cards.flavor:
"Esper, like any work of art, can be truly appreciated only from a distance."
—Tezzeret
cards.name: Tower Gargoyle
cards.text: Flying

cards.flavor: As Trostani's influence grew, vitality spread through the Conclave—much to the other guilds' dismay.
cards.name: Unflinching Courage
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample and lifelink.

cards.flavor: As the Simic released more of their krasis experiments, they required new habitats, always at the expense of the locals.
cards.name: Urban Evolution
cards.text: Draw three cards. You may play an additional land this turn.

cards.flavor: Out of sight, into mind.
cards.name: Vanish into Memory
cards.text: Exile target creature. You draw cards equal to that creature's power. At the beginning of your next upkeep, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you do, discard cards equal to that creature's toughness.

cards.name: Voice of Resurgence
cards.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn or when Voice of Resurgence dies, create a green and white Elemental creature token with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control."

cards.flavor: It provides what every discerning mage requires—time to think.
cards.name: Wall of Denial
cards.text:
Defender, flying
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

cards.name: Wayfaring Temple
cards.text:
Wayfaring Temple's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
Whenever Wayfaring Temple deals combat damage to a player, populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

cards.flavor: One of the most ferocious and deadly gargantuans, the thoctar never sees its worshippers, but it often awakens surrounded by gifts and sacrifices.
cards.name: Woolly Thoctar

cards.flavor: Zur remained aloof from Terisiare's suffering, intent only on his own perfection.
cards.name: Zur the Enchanter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Zur the Enchanter attacks, you may search your library for an enchantment card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.

cards.name: Aethertow
cards.text:
Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

cards.flavor:
"Imagine a thunderstorm that's also a tactical genius. That's him."
—Dars Gostok, Firefist captain
cards.name: Boros Reckoner
cards.text:
Whenever Boros Reckoner is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target creature or player.
{R/W}: Boros Reckoner gains first strike until end of turn.

cards.flavor: Those who regard the Gruul as savage simpletons underestimate the subtle power of their shamans.
cards.name: Burning-Tree Emissary
cards.text: When Burning-Tree Emissary enters the battlefield, add {R}{G} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Giantbaiting
cards.text:
Create a 4/4 red and green Giant Warrior creature token with haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it.)

cards.flavor:
"Remember by whose gift you ascend."
—Milana, Orzhov prelate
cards.name: Gift of Orzhova
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying and lifelink.

cards.flavor: Olka collected the evening mist for years, studying its secrets. Once she learned its essence, she could vanish with a thought.
cards.name: Mistmeadow Witch
cards.text: {2}{W}{U}: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.flavor:
"One day every pillar will be a tree and every hall a glade."
—Trostani
cards.name: Sundering Growth
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

cards.flavor: The Tattermunge gang has no words for the spell that whips their instinctual rage into a frenzy. They only know they like it.
cards.name: Tattermunge Witch
cards.text: {R}{G}: Each blocked creature gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Torrent of Souls
cards.text: Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield if {B} was spent to cast Torrent of Souls. Creatures target player controls get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn if {R} was spent to cast Torrent of Souls. (Do both if {B}{R} was spent.)

cards.name: Wort, the Raidmother
cards.text:
When Wort, the Raidmother enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red and green Goblin Warrior creature tokens.
Each red or green instant or sorcery spell you cast has conspire. (As you cast the spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose new targets for the copy.)

cards.flavor: The maze-like design embodies the core of Azorius law—strict structure designed to test wills and stall change.
cards.name: Azorius Signet
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {W}{U} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: During their endless travels, the mages of the Goma Fada caravan have learned ways to harness both life and death.
cards.name: Basilisk Collar
cards.text:
Equipped creature has deathtouch and lifelink.
Equip {2}

cards.flavor:
"Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size—a weight of strength and of pride."
—Agrus Kos
cards.name: Boros Signet
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {R}{W} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: The priests tried cursing it. The mages tried dispelling it. In the end, they all obeyed it.
cards.name: Damping Matrix
cards.text: Activated abilities of artifacts and creatures can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

cards.flavor: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members—and the doomed.
cards.name: Dimir Signet
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {U}{B} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: Depending on your point of view, the seal represents a proud guardian of the natural cycle or one who has sold her soul to darkness for eternal life.
cards.name: Golgari Signet
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {B}{G} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor:
"If you wind up in one of mine, you can be sure as silver it will be your last."
—Grafdigger Wulmer
cards.name: Grafdigger's Cage
cards.text:
Creature cards can't enter the battlefield from graveyards or libraries.
Players can't cast cards in graveyards or libraries.

cards.flavor: Gruul territorial markings need not be legible. The blood, snot, and muck used to smear them are unmistakably Gruul.
cards.name: Gruul Signet
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {R}{G} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.
cards.name: Izzet Signet
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {U}{R} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: The form of the sigil is just as important as the sigil itself. If it's carried on a medallion, its bearer is a master. If it's tattooed on the body, its bearer is a slave.
cards.name: Orzhov Signet
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {W}{B} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: Made of bone and boiled in blood, a Rakdos signet is not considered finished until it has been used as a murder weapon.
cards.name: Rakdos Signet
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {B}{R} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: The symbol of the Conclave is one of unity, with tree supporting sun and sun feeding tree.
cards.name: Selesnya Signet
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {G}{W} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: For the Simic Combine, its sigil serves not as an emblem of honor but as a trademark. Its familiar image on any biological commodity attests to superb craftsmanship, ingenious innovation, and higher cost.
cards.name: Simic Signet
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Add {G}{U} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor:
"We must rely on our own knowledge, not on the dogma of the seekers or the mutterings of the sphinxes."
—Tullus of Palandius
cards.name: Arcane Sanctum
cards.text:
Arcane Sanctum enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Arid Mesa
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Arid Mesa: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: The Azorius symbol stares down like a great eye, reminding visitors of the watchful presence of Isperia and her lawmages.
cards.name: Azorius Guildgate
cards.text:
Azorius Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: It promises protection to those in need and proclaims a warning to any who would threaten Ravnican law.
cards.name: Boros Guildgate
cards.text:
Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Cavern of Souls
cards.text:
As Cavern of Souls enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type, and that spell can't be countered.

cards.flavor:
"They say the ruins of Sedraxis were once a shining capital in Vithia. Now it is a blight, a place to be avoided by the living."
—Olcot, Rider of Joffik
cards.name: Crumbling Necropolis
cards.text:
Crumbling Necropolis enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: In the cold corridors of the undercity, misinformation unfurls from Duskmantle like a spreading stain.
cards.name: Dimir Guildgate
cards.text:
Dimir Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: Every part of the gate was reclaimed from forgotten ruins and imbued with new purpose by the Swarm.
cards.name: Golgari Guildgate
cards.text:
Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: The scarred rubble around the gate is testament to past meetings of the Clans, summits that inevitably devolved into brawls.
cards.name: Gruul Guildgate
cards.text:
Gruul Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: Beyond lies the culmination of all Izzet projects, a grand experiment led by the dragon Niv-Mizzet himself.
cards.name: Izzet Guildgate
cards.text:
Izzet Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: On Naya, ambition and treachery are scarce, hunted nearly to extinction by the awe owed to terrestrial gods.
cards.name: Jungle Shrine
cards.text:
Jungle Shrine enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Marsh Flats
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Marsh Flats: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Misty Rainforest
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Misty Rainforest: Search your library for a Forest or Island card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor:
"We do not believe in hiding our wealth in the shadows. This is Orzhov, and this is how we reward greatness."
—Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov
cards.name: Orzhov Guildgate
cards.text:
Orzhov Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: Maze-runners who pass through the Rakdos gate leave behind their scruples and a significant amount of skin.
cards.name: Rakdos Guildgate
cards.text:
Rakdos Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: Jund is a world as cruel as those who call it home. Their brutal struggles scar the land even as it carves them in its image, a vicious circle spiraling out of control.
cards.name: Savage Lands
cards.text:
Savage Lands enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Scalding Tarn
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Scalding Tarn: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: For wisdom's sake, it was built high to gaze on all things. For glory's sake, it was built high as a testament of power. For strength's sake, it was built high to repel all attacks.
cards.name: Seaside Citadel
cards.text:
Seaside Citadel enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: The Selesyna welcome all to help them heal the city's wounds. The price, however, is devotion to the guild and a selfless belief in Trostani.
cards.name: Selesnya Guildgate
cards.text:
Selesnya Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: Untold riches await those who forsake the bustling world to search the secret, silent places.
cards.name: Shimmering Grotto
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: Simic biomancers don't concern themselves with guarding a gate. Their ever-present creations are enough to ward off trespassers.

Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.
